reviews.text:
A well managed park, where chickens abound. Managed to observe a cute mudskipper and a water monitor too.
This morning was cool and the walk heavily canopied. Perfect for a peaceful and relaxing morning stroll.

‚ú≥Ô∏èBeen here a few times to this Pasir Ris Mangrove Boardwalk for a stroll. It is a nice walk and you can view the ancient mangroves from the boardwalk.

üå≥üå≥‚òòÔ∏è There are lots of interesting tropical flora and fauna to be observed too. Here are some throwback photos over the years.

üå≥‚úÖÔ∏èüü®  It is best to come here either early morning or evening time. Because midday would be too hot and humid for a walk.

Pasir Ris Mangrove Boardwalk let visitors appreciate its mangrove swamp habitat without getting the feet dirty.
The elevated boardwalk network connects the entire mangrove swamp. It even connects to a Bird Watching Tower as well.
A section of the boardwalk lead to a viewing Jetty that overlook Sungei Tampines.
Bird Watch Huts and View Decks were strategically located along the Boardwalk.
Overall, a great experience.
Not too hot even in the late morning as the mangrove tree canopies provided the shade.
Very nice and has a lot of interesting animals. Saw snakes and mudskippers and crabs as well.
I love to visit here. Very authentic scenery around this boardwalk but I was so scary when I visited here alone.
